New Records: Rohit Sharma scored his fastest T20 fifty in 19 balls
Key Match Events: Travis Head's 76 off 43 was a counterattack but India's bowlers kept their nerve
Jasprit Bumrah's loopy slower off-cutter induced a false shot to have Head caught at cover
Pre-Game Insights: No specific insights mentioned in the article
Post-Match Reflections: No specific reflections mentioned in the article
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a flat track with the impact of the prevailing east-to-west wind becoming evident
India maintained a right-left batting combination to counter Adam Zampa and yielded 41 off his four overs
Others: India will face England in the second semifinal in Guyana on June 27
Australia will await the result of Afghanistan vs Bangladesh match to learn its fate
